title: Outward foreign direct investment (FDI)
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Total FDI international investment position abroad at end period (experimental statistics), Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), 2015-2021.
description:
This dataset shows the total FDI international investment position abroad at end period (experimental statistics), in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for 2015-2021. To see these figures presented visually, please refer to Figures 2 to 5 in [Foreign direct investment, experimental UK subnational estimates: 2021](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/nationalaccounts/balanceofpayments/articles/foreigndirectinvestmentexperimentaluksubnationalstatistics/2021).

### Coverage 

GB (England, Wales and Scotland). Northern Ireland national figure included.

#### Geography definition

International Territorial Level (ITL) 1 and 2,
City Regions,
Country (UK)

### Source

 - Great Britain: [Office for National Statistics](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/nationalaccounts/balanceofpayments/articles/foreigndirectinvestmentexperimentaluksubnationalstatistics/previousReleases)
